p: The metabolomic profile was generated and analyzed by multivariate statistical analysis. A heatmap was constructed using RStudio (Version 1.1.463–© 2021–2018 RStudio, Inc., Boston, MA, USA) using the gplots, cluster, tidyverse, factoextra, and heatmap.plus packages. Correlation matrices and significance were also performed in RStudio using the factoextra, FactoMineR, and corrplot packages.
